name: The Scuffed Series 19 - Gardening around Explosives
name_original: The Scuffed Series 19 - Gardening around Explosives
description:
4/5 - Completely different from the rest I've made, but pretty cool (actually some colour for once :D)

Try to bloom saplings in your garden by planting them next to a water source while random places on the map explode leaving giant holes behind. Connecting multiple water sources with blooming saplings awards bonus points at the end of the round.

You can toggle fullscreen with Alt + Enter and resize the window with Alt + Arrow up and Alt + Arrow Down

If you want to find out what The Scuffed Series is all about, check out the website (link in infos down below)
